title: My Intimate Poetry: The Valentine's Edition
description: For all of the sensual souls, this one's for you. Tammy-Louise Wilkins makes a surprising release with a compilation of poetry stitched for the most romantic holiday of the year, Valentine's Day. Her newest anthology features some of her much loved poems that detail tales of lust, love, adultery, sex, and finding that elusive "happily ever after."
author: Tammy-Louise Wilkins
